cab.content:
(THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT)
SECRET.
G.T.6595.
IMPERIAL WAR CABINET.
REMOVAL OR MODIFICATION OF RESTRICTIONS PREVENTING THE BRITISH DOMINIONS FROM FLOATING SECURITIES IN GREAT BRITAIN.
Note by the Secretary.
Sir Robert Borden has put forward the following subject for discussion by the Imperial War Cabinet at a convenient opportunity:-
"Consideration of the removal or modification of restrictions preventing the British Dominions from floating securities in Great Britain."
(Signed) M.P.A.HANKEY,
Secretary, War Cabinet.
2 Whitehall Gardens, S.W.1.
4th January, 1919.
